synopsis.native: Victoria est une petite fille de 8 ans, mutique depuis la disparition de sa maman. Lors d’une promenade en forêt, un berger lui confie un chiot nommé « Mystère » qui va petit-à-petit lui redonner goût à la vie. Mais très vite, son père découvre que l’animal est en réalité un loup.
synopsis.english: Stéphane decides to move to the beautiful Cantal mountains to reconnect with his eight-year-old daughter Victoria, who has been mute since her mother's death. During a walk in the forest, a shepherd gives Victoria a puppy named Mystery who will gradually give her a taste for life again. But very quickly, Stéphane discovers that the animal is in fact a wolf... Despite warnings and the danger of the situation, he cannot bring himself to separate his daughter from this seemingly harmless ball of fur.
